en: The cost to society will be substantial, the report says. In 2019 alone, it estimates a $290 billion burden from health care, long-term case and hospice combined. Medicare and Medicaid will cover $195 billion of that, with out-of-pocket costs to caregivers reaching $63 billion.

I-Medicare ne-Medicaid izokhokhela izindleko eziyizigidigidi ezingama-$195 walokho, ngezindleko ezikhokhwa ngqo zabanakekeli ezifinyelela kuzigidigidi ezingama-$63.
mt0: <pad> The costs of public health will be huge, the report said. In 2019, the burden of health costs was estimated at $290 billion, including long-term illnesses and hospice. Medicare and Medicaid will cover 195 billion of that, with direct caregiver costs of 63 billion.</s>

en: "We are excited that this tool has proven useful to guide local restoration efforts such as the Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary restoration project currently underway in North Carolina," Theuerkauf says. "The beauty of this model and approach is that it can be modified for use in a number of different habitat restoration efforts -- such as mangrove restoration in Florida, where the benefits the habitat provides are different from those of oyster reefs, but similarly very valuable."
zul: "Siyakujabulela ukuthi le nsiza ibonakalile ukuthi izosiza ukuhola ukuvuselelwa kwe-Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary kwasendaweni oqhubekayo njengamanje eNorth Carolina," kusho uTheuerkauf.  "Okuhle ngalolu hlelo nendlelakwenza wukuthi ingalungiselelwa ukusetshenziswa ezindaweni zokuhlala ezahlukene zokubuyisa -- njengokubuyiselwa kwezihlahla ze-mangrove eFlorida, lapho izinzuzo ezihlinzekwa yileyo ndawo zehlukile kunalezo zothunge lwembada, kodwa nazo zibaluleke ngokufanayo."
mt0: <pad> "We are happy that this funding will help lead the refurbishment of Swan Island Oyster Sanctuary in North Carolina," said Teuerkauf. "The good thing about this program and its approach is that it can be adapted to be used in different habitat restoration sites -- such as the Florida mangrove refurbishment, where the benefits offered by this site are different from the benefits offered by the oceanfront, but also important."</s>

en: Rosario, based at Saratoga in New York for the summer, made the right choice to spend the weekend at Del Mar. He escaped the brutal heat that forced the cancellation of Saturday's card at Saratoga, and he backed up the San Diego win with a victory four races later in the Grade II $200,000 San Clemente Stakes aboard Mucho Unusual.
zul: URosario, oseSaratoga eNew York ngesikhathi sasehlobo, uthathe isinqumo esifanele sokuchitha impelasonto eDel Mar. Uphunyuke ekushiseni okubi okuphoqe ukusulwa kwekhadi langoMgqibelo eSaratoga, futhi unqobile eSan Diego emincintiswaneni emine ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuBanga II $200,000 San Clemente Stakes egibele iMucho Unusual.
mt0: <pad> Rosario, who is in Saratoga Springs in New York during the summer, made the right decision to spend the weekend in Del Mar. He escaped the bad weather that forced the Saturday card at Saratoga to be abandoned, and won four races in San Diego in the same period of time in the Class II $200,000 San Clemente Stakes on Mucho Unusual.</s>

en: Last week, the South Bend City Councilman Oliver Davis endorsed former Vice President Joe Biden in what several outlets viewed as a rejection of Mayor Pete. On Friday, Davis told Politico that he's happy to see someone representing Indiana on the national stage, but Biden offered more experience than the 37-year-old.
zul: Ngeviki eledlule, u-Oliver David Ongumuntu Wasemkhandlwini weDolobha i-South Bend wesekele uSekela Mongameli uJoe Biden kulokho izikhungo eziningi ezikubone kuwukuchitha uSodolobha uPete. NgoLwesihlanu, uDavis utshele i-Politico ukuthi ukujabulele ukubona umuntu omele i-Indiana kuzwelonke, kodwa uBiden ubonakalise ukuba nesipiliyoni esiningi kunalo muntu oneminyaka engama-37.
mt0: <pad> Last week, South Bend City Councilman Oliver David supported Joe Biden in what many institutions saw as a waste of Pete. On Thursday, Davis told Politico that he was happy to see someone representing Indiana nationally, but Biden seemed to have more experience than the 37-year-old.</s>

en: However, the loss of two Labour first minsters - first the sudden death of Donald Dewar and then the resignation of Henry McLeish - followed by the lacklustre and lackadaisical administration of Jack McConnell and the catastrophic organisation of the 2007 elections - opened the door to an SNP minority government by the narrowest of margins.
zul: Nokho, ukulahlekelwa ongqongqoshe bokuqala be-Labour - okokuqala kube wukudlula emhlabeni kukaDonald Dewar kanye nokushiya esikhundleni kukaHenry McLeish - kwalandelwa ukuphatha ngaphandle kogqozi kanye nokungazimiseli kukaJack McConnell kanye nokuhlelwa kokhetho okungahambanga kahle ngowezi-2007 - kwavulela uhulumeni we-SNP intuba yokungena ngezibalo ezincane kakhulu.

en: In the November debate, I joined nine presidential candidates who agree that corruption pervades our democracy, and we need to change how Washington works. But none are willing to go as far as to call for congressional term limits. Why?

Kodwa akekho ovuma ukuqhubeka kangangoba aze acele kumiswe imikhawulo yesikhathi sokusebenza enhlanganweni. Ngobani?
mt0: <pad> In November, I joined a number of presidential candidates who admitted that corruption has spread throughout our society, and that Washington needs to change its way of working. But no one agreed to go so far as to demand time limits for the organization. Who?</s>

en: Shellfish collected by children are most easily identified by variety and size, Keegan said. Child foragers tend to be generalists, meaning that they're more likely to collect small shells indiscriminately. This research suggests that small, easy to transport and low-yield mollusks found in high amounts on a site indicate the presence of child foragers, he said.
zul: Ama-shellfish aqoqwa izingane kuvame ukuba lula ukuwahlonza ngokohlobo nobungako, kusho uKeegan. Abadobi abayizingane bavame ukubheka okujwayelekile, okusho ukuthi maningi kakhulu amathuba okuthi baqoqe amagobolondo amancane ngaphandle kokukhetha. Uthe, lolu cwaningo lusho ukuthi izinkovu ezincane, okulula ukuzithutha nezinenzuzo encane ezitholakala ziziningi kakhulu endaweni ziveza ukuthi bekukhona abadobi abayizingane.
mt0: <pad> Children's shellfish are often easy to categorize by type and size, said Keegan. Children tend to look for the commonest, meaning they are more likely to collect smaller shrimp without selection, he said. The research also suggests that smaller nets, easier to transport and smaller profits are a lot more common in areas where children were fishing, he said.</s>

en: Soyuncu still needs a little refinement, of course. The Leicester coach Kolo Touré will surely also have good counsel to give on that front.

Ubufakazi okwamanje busho ukuthi uRodgers no-Evans bazosiza umdlali wasesiswini odlala emuva aphumelele kangcono ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa ubuyena. Umqeqeshi we-Leicester uKolo Touré nakanjani uzoba nezeluleko ezilungile azomnika zona maqondana nalokho.
mt0: <pad> Soyuncu still needs some adjustments, definitely. The only game Leicester have lost this season was against Manchester United, where Marcus Rashford forced Soyuncu to give up a penalty. The evidence so far is that Rodgers and Evans will help the central defender succeed better without losing his individuality. Leicester manager Kolo Toure will certainly have good advice to give him on that.</s>

en: The fund was established by Congress in the aftermath of the 2001 Al Qaeda attacks, to pay compensation to the victims and their families. It also established payments for emergency workers who were affected by labouring in perilous and sometimes deadly conditions amid toxic chemicals.

mt0: <pad> Congress established the fund after the 2001 al Qaeda attack, to compensate victims and their families. It also created means to pay emergency medical workers affected by working in extremely dangerous and potentially fatal conditions that could lead to death due to the toxic chemicals present.</s>

en: The production of sperm -- otherwise known as spermatogenesis -- generates more than 1,000 sperm per second in normal males. This productivity comes, in part, from a special cell type called the spermatogonial stem cell. The staying power of this stem cell has allowed many celebrities, including Robert DeNiro and Pablo Picasso, to father children after the age of 65.
zul: Ukukhiqizwa kwezidoda - okubuye kubizwe ngokuthi i-spermatogenesis - kukhiqiza izidoda ezingaphezu kwe-1,000 ngomzuzu ngamunye emadodeni ngokuvamile. Lokhu kukhiqiza kwenzeka, njengengxenye, kuvela kuhlobo lweseli olukhethekile olubizwa nge-spermatogonial stem cell. Amandla okuhlala ale stem cell avumele ukuthi inqwaba yosaziwayo, okubandakanya uRobert DeNiro noPablo Picasso, babe woyise bezingane beneminyaka engama-65.
mt0: <pad> Semen production - also called spermogenesis - produces over 1,000 sperms per second in normal men. This production happens, in part, from a special type of cell called the spermatogonial stem cell. The reproductive power of the stem cell has allowed a number of celebrities, including Robert DeNiro and Pablo Picasso, to be fathers of children at 65 years of age.</s>

en: Converting the country to 100 percent clean power? In Vermont alone, which has a goal of achieving 90 percent renewable energy by midcentury, the cost is estimated at $33 billion. Yet the state is seeing job growth in clean energy sectors and expects the transition will spur cost savings for consumers.
zul: Ukushintsha izwe lisebenzise amandla kagesi olungele imvelo ngamaphesenti ayi-100? EVermont iyodwa, enomgomo wokuthola amaphesenti angama-90 kagesi ovuselelwayo maphakathi nekhuluminyaka, izindleko zilinganiselwa kuzigidigidi ezingama-$33. Kepha uhulumeni ubona ukwanda kwemisebenzi emikhakheni kagesi olungele imvelo futhi ulindele ukuthi lolu guquko lulethele amakhasimende ukonga ezindlekweni.
mt0: <pad> How much would it cost to change the world to use 100% green energy? In Vermont alone, with a goal of achieving 90% green energy by the middle of the century, the cost is estimated at $33. But the government sees an increase in jobs in green energy and hopes that this change will bring consumers savings on energy costs.</s>

en: Today, those using Planck and cosmic background data to obtain a value for the Hubble constant get a figure of 67.4 plus or minus 0.5. By contrast the local approach gives a figure of 73.5 plus or minus 1.4. These values represent the two different values we have for the expansion of the universe. (See "A matter of metrics," below.)
zul: Namuhla, labo abasebenzisa i-Planck kanye nemininingo yomlando womhlaba ukuzothola isilinganiso se-Hubble bathola inani elingu-67.4 plus noma umayinazi 0.5. Okushayisana nendlela esetshenziswa endaweni ekhipha inani elingu-73.5 plus noma umayinazi 1.4. Lezi zilinganiso zimele amanani amabili ahlukene esinawo okwandisa umhlaba wonke jikelele. (Bheka "i-A matter of metrics," ngezansi.)
mt0: <pad> Today, those who use Planck and Earth's history data to obtain the Hubble average get 67.4 plus or 0.5. The collision method gives 73.5 plus or 1.4. Those two values represent two different rates of magnification we have for the Universe. (See "A matter of metrics," below.)</s>

en: For a majority of people, music is a part of everyday life, and living without it is impossible. It's a constant companion, one that kids develop a taste for during their formative years and bring with them as an adult. Some merely use it as a distraction, while some love it so much that it influences them as a person. Some even write it for a living.
zul: Ebantwini abaningi, umculo uyingxenye yempilo yansukuzonke, futhi ayikho indlela yokuphila ngaphandle kwawo. Kuhlala kuhamba phambili, uyilokho izingane eziqala ukukuthanda zisezincane futhi ziqhubeke nakho nasebudaleni. Abanye bawusebenzisa njengento yokuphazamisa, kube abanye bawuthanda kangangoba uba nomthelela kubo njengabantu. Abanye baze bawubhale okuba yindlela yabo yokuziphilisa.
mt0: <pad> For many people, music is a part of daily life, and there is no way to live without it. It's always leading, it's what children start to love as young as they are and continue to do so in their adulthood. Some use it as a distraction, while others love it so much that it affects them as people. Some even write it as their living medium.</s>

en: Unlike cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, nifties are cryptographic tokens that represent a unique asset or good on the blockchain, are one of a kind, and are not interchangeable. Blockchains can enable gamers to buy and trade interoperable digital collectibles such as skins, dances, and in-game items, helping further fuel a $50 billion-plus annual market1 for virtual goods.
zul: Hhayi njengama-cryptocurrencies anjenge-bitcoin, ama-nifties angamathokheni anezithombe ezi-cryptographic ezimele impahla ehlukile kwi-blockchain, okungavamile, futhi okungasebenziseki ngokushintshanisa. Ama-blockchain angenza abadlali bathenge futhi bahwebe ngezinto ezisebenza ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ezoqoqekayo njengama-skin, abadansi, nezinto zemidlalo, okusiza ukuqhubeka nokufaka isamba esingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingu-$50 ezimakethe maqondana nempahla yezobuchwepheshe ephakathi kumakhompyutha.
mt0: <pad> No, not like other cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, nifties are tokens with cryptographic images that represent different assets on the blockchain, unusual, and not usable for exchange. Blockchains can allow players to buy and trade digital tangible items like skin, avatars, and game items, helping to continue to add over $50 billion into the market for computer hardware.</s>

en: For one thing, Sondland's testimony explicitly and in detail outlined what he described without reservation as a quid pro quo - one focused on an effort to leverage an official White House meeting to pressure Ukraine to announce new investigations. The claim that "no quid pro quo" ever occurred is the opposite of what Sondland testified. It's just that the quid pro quo that Sondland expressly articulated isn't the one that was the subject of that call.
zul: Ngento eyodwa, ubufakazi bukaSondland ngokusobala buveza imininingwane yalokho okuchazwe ngokusobala ukuthi i-quid pro quo - egxile emizamweni yokusebenzisa umhlangano we-White House osemthethweni ukufakela i-Ukraine ingcindezi yokumemezela ngophenyo olusha. Ukuthi "no quid pro quo" kwake kwenzeka kuphambene nalokho okushiwo uSondland lapho efakaza. Wukuthi nje i-quid pro quo yokuthi uSondland waveza ngokusobala akusikho obekuyisihloko ebesidingidwa kulolo cingo.
mt0: <pad> For one thing, Sondland's testimony clearly reveals the details of what was clearly described as a quid pro quo - focused on attempts to use the White House legislative meeting to pressure Ukraine to declare a new investigation. The "no quid pro quo" is not in fact contrary to what Sondland said when he testified. It's just that the quid pro quo that Sondland clearly revealed was not the subject that was required for the call.</s>

en: Neither the United States nor any nation on Earth has sent a manned mission to the moon since NASA's Apollo 17 mission left in late 1972. While the space administration has periodically made plans to return, none have reached the operational phase. A large part of the reason is a lack of money and support.

mt0: <pad> No U.S. or any other country on Earth has sent a rocket to the moon since the Apollo 17 mission of NASA in 1972. As space authorities have kept backing plans for return times, no one has ever reached the stage of doing that. A large part of this reason is the cost of money and support.</s>

en: When I booked a three-day singing retreat at Peter Evans's farmhouse in rural France, I had been apprehensive about displaying my pitiful abilities to some intimidating Oxford choral scholar type. Kodwa esikhundleni salokho ngizithole ngiculela phansi kukhala isigingci sisho iculo ngokugcizelela indlela yokukhuluma yaseLondon kuhambisana namahlaya amabi kakhulu.
mt0: <pad> When I was proposing a three-day music rehearsal program at Peter Evan's piano house in rural France, I had a reservation about showing my fine skills to the Oxford type of gentlemen singers. Instead I found myself singing on the floor shouting a song with accents on London accents combined with the worst jokes.</s>

en: "We were really good that tournament right the way through to the final. I don't think it motivates or carries me to do any better," Genia said. "It's just embracing it and enjoying it. Kuba njalo eminyakeni emine. Wuhlobo oluhlukile lomsindo futhi uhlobo oluhlukile lwamandla uma ulapha uma udlala kwiNdebe Yomhlaba ngoba kunakwa kakhulu umdlalo webhola lombhoxo."
mt0: <pad> "We played very well in the tournament and were just sitting there until the end. I don't think it makes me feel any better or motivates me," said Genia. "It's just acceptance and enjoyment. It happens every four years. It's a different kind of noise and a different kind of energy when you're here playing for the World Cup because the football is so much criticised here."</s>

en: Anirban Lahiri of India did not have to qualify for his previous two U.S. Opens, and he doesn't want to have to go through it again. Lahiri had no trouble with a 65 at Scioto and a 67 at Brookside, but he could do without the stress. He had never seen either course, opting for what he called "point and shoot."
zul: U-Anirban Lahiri waseNdiya akazange afaneleke ukungena kuma-U.S. Open amabili adlule, futhi akudingeki aphinde adlule kuwo futhi. ULahiri akabanga nenkinga ne-65 at Scioto kanye ne-67 at Brookside, kodwa ubengakwenza ngaphandle kwengcindezi. Ubengakazi azibone zonke izinkundla zokudlala, wakhetha lokhu akubize ngokuthi "point and shoot."
mt0: <pad> Indian Anirban Lahiri did not qualify for the two U.S. Opens, and did not need to again. Lahiri had no problems with 65 at Scioto and 67 at Brookside, but he was playing without pressure. He hadn't seen all the grounds yet, so he decided to do what he called "point and shoot."</s>

en: Meanwhile, the oil market received a more direct boost this week on news that Saudi Arabia slashed shipments to the United States. The US has the most transparent and up-to-date data on the oil market, which include weekly releases on production levels, imports and exports, and inventories. That kind of visibility is not readily available in most places around the world.
zul: Kusenjalo, imakethe kawoyela ithole uxhaso oluqonde ngqo kuleli sonto ngezindaba zokuthi iSaudi Arabia iyeke ukuthumele impahla e-United States. I-US inemininingo esobala kakhulu nebuyekeziwe maqondana nezimakethe zawoyela, okubandakanya ukukhishwa kwamazinga omkhiqizo esonto, okuthengiselwa amanye amazwe nokuthengwa kuvela kwamanye amazwe, kanye nohlu lwempahla. Lolo hlobo lokubonakala alutholakali ngaleso sikhathi ezindaweni eziningi emhlabeni.
mt0: <pad> However, the oil market received direct support this week after news that Saudi Arabia had stopped exporting to the United States. The US has the most transparent and up-to-date information about oil markets, including weekly production levels, export sales and imports, and a list of products. That kind of clarity is not available at the moment in many other parts of the world.</s>

en: At that point, they would have 11 victories and at least have a wild-card spot wrapped up, with only two teams remaining that could be wild cards that could have fewer than six losses (49ers if they didn't win the West, at which point Seattle would have won the West, and Vikings and/or Packers, one of whom will win the NFC North).

mt0: <pad> At that point, they had won 11 times and had at least one wild card spot, with only two remaining teams that could have wild cards that were eliminated less than six times (the 49ers if they hadn't won West, then Seattle would win West, and the Vikings and/or Packers, one of them winning the NFC North).</s>

en: Her time at the helm in Guantánamo would have most likely been short, former CIA counterterrorism officer-turned-whistleblower John Kiriakou told McClatchy."Nobody wanted the job," he said. "So they resorted to sending people on temporary duty assignments ranging from six weeks to nine months."

Wathi, “akekho owayefuna umsebenzi. Ngakho bagcina bekhetha ukuthumela abantu emsebenzini wesikhashana osukela emavikini ayisithupha kuya ezinyangeni eziyisishiyagalolunye."

en: In theory, yes - it's the board's job to negotiate with corporate bosses on behalf of shareholders. In practice, this is another principal-agent problem, as bosses can often influence who directors are and how much they're paid. There's obvious potential for mutual back-scratching.

mt0: <pad> To my knowledge, yes – it is the board's job to negotiate with the company's management representing the shareholders. In fact, this is one of the biggest problems, because the management can influence who are directors and how much they get paid. It is clear that there will be some clashes.</s>

en: Joby Aviation Inc. is targeting the air-taxi market with a plane that would carry four passengers and travel 150 miles. I-Eviation ekwa-Israel ihlela ukuhlola izindiza ehlobo elizayo ze-Alice kagesi, indiza ehlalisa abagibeli abayisishiyagalolunye eqhutshwa uhlobo oluncane lwenjini ye-magniX e- Harbour's Beaver.

en: Now, one thing everybody knows about me is that I cannot fight. If you asked my sister Kay whether I can handle myself in a scrap, she would throw back her head and cackle like a witch. I needed to think my way out of this.

Kodwa nsuku zonke ngangigingqika phansi noDanny Waverly, owayengizondela isizathu esisodwa sokuthi ngangimpisholo. Ngangikhathele ukulokhu ngisuswa. Kwakumele ngizicabangele ukuze ngiphume kulokhu.
mt0: <pad> Now, one thing everyone knows about me is that I can't fight. If you ask my sister Kay if I could behave well if I was kicked out, she will nod her head and look at me like a wizard. mt0: <pad> In the 70 images I made for the South African painter and activist Moholy, "The Black Lion, The Lion Who Roars in the Dark," the artist also took pictures of black and brown people who were historically abused and excluded from art exhibitions. en: "By asking the state courts to reconsider their ruling in light of Masterpiece Cakeshop, the justices are, in effect, asking the Oregon courts if a similarly narrow basis is available for resolving this case -- even though the parties have framed the case as presenting a broader conflict between the constitutional rights to religious liberty and same-sex marriage."

mt0: <pad> "By asking the courts to reconsider their decision on Masterpiece Cakeshop, the organizers, in fact, are asking Oregon courts whether there is a common ground for resolving this case -- even though the parties have taken the case as representing a wide range of issues ranging from constitutional rights to religion and same-sex marriage."</s>

en: "I do something eccentric that has surprised some unsuspecting passengers ― I put on a sheet mask every few hours! I buy bulk packages of hydrating Asian sheet masks, without fragrance so that they don't irritate my skin or the noses of people around me. They generally contain hyaluronic acid and other gentle moisturizing ingredients ... This keeps my skin feeling well-hydrated and comfortable throughout the flight." ― La Carmina
zul: "Ngenza into engavamile ethuse abagibeli abebengalindele ― Ngifake imaskhi yephepha njalo emuva kwamahora ambalwa! Ngithenga amaphakethe amamaskhi ephepha ase-Asia aqeda ukoma kwesikhumba, angenawo amakha ukuze angasiphazamisi isikhumba sami noma amakhala abantu abasondelene nami. Bavame ukuqukatha i-hyaluronic acid kanye nezinye izithako ezilungele ukugcoba isikhumba ... Lokhu kugcina isikhumba sami singomanga futhi singangibangeli inkinga ohambweni lwebhanoyi lonke." ― La Carmina
mt0: <pad> "I do something unusual that surprises unexpected passengers: I wear a paper mask every few hours! I buy Asian skin-smoothing paper masks, without smell, so they don't irritate my skin or the people around me. They often contain hyaluronic acid and other skin-hydrating ingredients... This keeps my skin supple and doesn't make me a problem throughout the whole plane ride." ― La Carmina</s>

en: The 93-year-old monarch will mark her official birthday this weekend at the most highly anticipated events in the royal calendar - an occasion she has never missed. Her first appearance at the momentous occasion was as a youngster at just 14-months-old for the birthday of her father, George VI. And 90 plus years later, the Queen will this Sunday be surrounded by her growing family on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
zul: Indlovukazi eneminyaka engama-93 izobungaza usuku lokuzalwa ngokusemthethweni ngale mpelasonto emicimbini elindeleke kakhulu ekhalendeni lasendlunkulu - okuwumcimbi angakaze aphuthwe yiwo.  Ukuvela kwakhe kokuqala emcimbini omkhulu okhumbulekayo kwenzeka esayingane enezinyanga eziyi-14 izelwe kuwusuku lokuzalwa kukayise. Futhi emuva kweminyaka engama-90, Indlunkulu ngaleli Sonto uzobe ehlezi nomndeni wakhe okhulayo kuvurande ophezulu esigodlweni i-Buckingham Palace.
mt0: <pad> The Queen, who is 93 years old, will celebrate her official birthday this weekend at the most anticipated event in the royal calendar - something she has never missed. Her first public appearance was as a baby aged 14 days on the birthday of her father. And after 90 years, the Queen will be sitting with her growing family in the upper room at Buckingham Palace on Sunday.</s>

en: "Amazing. I'm actually going to be alright," joked Murray, before getting serious. "That was incredible. Thank you so, so much to everyone who came out tonight. I've honestly loved playing here over the years. If that was my last match it was a perfect way to end, I gave everything I had but congratulations to Roberto and his team.
zul: "Isimanga. Empeleni zizongilungela izinto," kusho uMurray ehlekisa, ngaphambi kokuba kube bucayi. "Kube kuhle kakhulu lokho. Ngibonga kakhulu, kangangoba wonke umuntu uphuma ebusuku. Empeleni ngakuthanda ukudlala lapha eminyakeni edlule. Ukuba kwaba wumdlalo wami wokugcina lowo ukusho kwaba yindlela efanele yokuwuqeda, ngikhiphe konke ebenginakho kodwa ngihalalisela uRoberto nethimba lakhe.
mt0: <pad> "It's amazing. They're really going to fix things," said Murray, before he went away. "I really liked playing here in the past. If that was my last game that was the right way to say it, I've given everything I had but I'm going to say goodbye to Roberto and his team."</s>

en: At age 8, he became part of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh, known as the R.S.S., a right-wing Hindu group that would play a huge role in his life. The R.S.S. is widely seen as a service organization. But its members are the foot soldiers of the Hindu nationalist movement, and some of its critics have accused it of being fascist - in the 1930s the group's members were inspired by Mussolini's Italy.

I-R.S.S. ibonakala kakhulu iyinhlangano ehlinzeka ngomsebenzi. Kodwa amalungu ayilabo abahamba ngezinyawo enhlanganweni yobezombusazwe bamaHindu, futhi abanye abangahambisani nayo bayisole ngokuba wontamolukhuni - ngeminyaka yo-1930 amalungu eqembu ayekhuthazwa i-Italy yeMussolini.
mt0: <pad> At eight, he joined the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh, known as R.S.S., a large Hindu political group that could play a crucial role in his life. The R.S.S. seems to be a very organized organization. But its members are not the front-runner of the Hindu political movement, and some opponents have accused it of being fascism - in the 1930s the members of the group were encouraged by Mussolini's Italy.</s>

en: Earlier Friday, Trump announced that tariffs on foreign automobiles and parts would be delayed by six months. That gives trade negotiators 180 days to work out a deal with Japan and the EU before resorting to tariffs, which would increase the cost of foreign-made cars and parts in the United States. U.S. trade representative Robert Lighthizer will lead the negotiations and report to Trump, the president said in a proclamation.
zul: NgoLwesihlanu ekuseni, uTrump umemezele ukuthi kuzobambezeleka izintela zezithuthi zakwamanye amazwe kanye nezingxenye zazo izinyanga eziyisithupha. Lokho kunika abaxoxisana nabahwebi izinsuku eziyi-180 zokubonisana ngesivumelwano sokuthenga neJaphani kanye ne-EU ngaphambi kokusebenzisa lezo zintela, ezizonyusa amanani ezimoto ezenziwe kwamanye amazwe kanye nezingxenye zazo e-United States. Omele abahwebi e-US uRobert Lighthizer uzohola izingxoxo futhi abikele uTrump, kusho umongemeli esimemezelweni sakhe.
mt0: <pad> Trump announced on Thursday morning that import taxes on cars and parts from other countries will be delayed for six months. This gives trade negotiators 180 days to negotiate a trade deal with Japan and the European Union before the taxes are imposed, which will raise the cost of cars and parts made in the United States. US Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer will lead the talks and report to Trump, the president said in his statement.</s>

en: In the quadrangle at school during lunchtime, when my friends were gossiping and giggling about boys, I'd read pages and pages in which my mother described how she had resisted, at the last minute, throwing herself off a cliff or wading into the sea to drown. She wrote how much she loved me and desperately missed us all. Still, she never came back.
zul: Endaweni yokudlela esikoleni ngesikhathi sokudla, lapho abangani bami babehleba begigitheka ngabafana, ngangifunda ikhasi namakhasi umama wami ayechaza kuwo ukuthi wazibamba kanjani, ngomzuzu wokugcina, ekuziphoseni eweni noma ekuziphoseni olwandle ukuze aminze. Wabhala ukuthi wayengithanda kangakanani futhi esikhumbula kakhulu kangakanani sonke. Kuze kuba manje, akakaze abuye.
mt0: <pad> In the school cafeteria during lunch, while my friends were gossiping about boys, I was reading pages and pages of my mother's letter describing how she held herself at the last minute from jumping off a mountain or swimming in the ocean to save me. She wrote how she loved me and missed us all so much. Until now, she has never come back.</s>

en: He told BBC Radio 4"s Today programme: "It's not just because of the regulations which Northern Ireland would be subject to with the backstop, but also the fact we would have to treat the rest of the United Kingdom as a third country, we would not participate in any trade deals which the United Kingdom may enter into in the future and we would find that there would be a border down the Irish Sea, which would impede trade with our biggest trading partner, namely GB."
zul: Utshele abasohlweni lwaNamuhla lwe-BBC Radio 4: "Ave nje kumayelana nemithethonqubo iNorthern Ireland ezophoqeleka ukuba ilandele i-backstop, kodwa kuphinde kube wukuba kuzodingeka ukuba i-United Kingdom iyonke njengezwe lesithathu, angeke sizibandakanye ezivumelwaneni sokuhweba i-United Kingdom engase ingene kuzo ngomuso futhi sithola ukuthi kuzoba nomngcele ezansi koLwandle lwama-Irish, okungavimba uhwebo lwethu nozakwethu abakhulu bezohwebo, okuyi-GB."
mt0: <pad> He told the BBC Radio 4 Today programme: "It's not just about the backstop, it's also about the UK as a third country, we can't join any trade deals the UK may enter in the future and we find that there will be a border under the Irish Sea, which could block our trade with our biggest trading partners, the UK.</s>

en: This kind of two-tier system of medical regulation could also lead techniques such as gene-editing to become much more culturally accepted in some countries than others. Our society continues to struggle with xenophobia and racism, so we may also find prejudices and legal dilemmas developing for genetically engineered humans (never mind human-animal hybrids).
zul: Lolu hlelo olukabili lokulawulwa kwezempilo lungase luhole izinhlelo ezinjengokuchitshiyelwa kohlelo lwendalo lokwakheka kokuthile okuphilayo ukuba zamukeleke kangcono ngokosiko kwamanye amazwe kunamanye. Umphakathi wethu uyaqhubeka nokubhekana nobunzima bokucwaswa kwabantu ngokobuzwe nangokohlanga, ngakho singase sithole ukuqubuka kwencindezi ebonisa ukuchema kanye nezingxushungxushu zezomthetho ebantwini abakhiwe ngokuchitshiyelwa kohlelo lwendalo lokwakheka kwabantu (singasakubali ukuxutshwa kwabantu nezilwane ngokwalolu hlelo).
mt0: <pad> This dual system of health control may lead to programs such as recombinant DNA being more culturally accepted in some countries than in others. Our society continues to face problems of racial and ethnic discrimination, so we may see an increase in pressure to show discontent and legal action against people created by recombinant DNA (not to mention the exploitation of humans and animals through this program).</s>

en: Following their successful Cork appearances cooking, foraging and fishing, the four chefs moved on to Dublin, where they are due to prepare a bush tucker dinner for 176 people on Friday night, local time. Emuva kwalokho amawele akwaBourke bazosebenza ezitolo zokudlela ezintathu zaseMichelin eziphuma phambili eLondon.
mt0: <pad> After their success in Cork cooking, hunting and fishing, the two cooks have moved to Dublin, where they are expected to cook a wild food dinner for 176 people on Thursday night, local time. Then the Bourke twins will work at three Michelin-starred restaurants in London.</s>

en: Based on "credible information," Callamard concluded there was insufficient evidence to suggest that either Turkey or the United States knew, or ought to have known, of a real and imminent or foreseeable threat to Khashoggi's life. There had been some speculation as the whether the CIA had known of a threat against Khashoggi and had failed to alert him, as is required by law.
zul: Ngokususela "olwazini olukholakalayo," uCallamard ubone ukuthi bekunobufakazi obanele obuveza ukuthi iTurkey noma i-United States beyazi, noma bekumele ngabe beyazi, ngobungozi bangempela noma obebungase bube khona empilweni kaKhashoggi. Kube nokuhlawumbisela ngokuthi kungenzeka na ukuthi i-CIA beyazi ngobungozi obubhekiswe kuKhashoggi bese bangamuqwashisa, njengoba bekulindelekile ngokomthetho.
mt0: <pad> Based on "credible knowledge," Callamard found that there was enough evidence to show that Turkey or the United States knew, or should have known, of real or potential danger to Khashoggi's life. There were speculations about whether the CIA knew of the danger to Khashoggi and did not alert him, as it was legally required to do.</s>

en: As part of his lucrative endorsement arrangement with Nike, Mr. Kaepernick appeared prominently in an advertising campaign celebrating the 30th anniversary of the company's "Just Do It" slogan. en: "For me, it was a feeling of, 'I knew I could do this, and now I've done it'. I believed it could be done, so it was nice to confirm that. I had a chance to win and took it, I didn't choke, I didn't freeze at the crucial time. I didn't crack under the pressure of being about to win my first race. I felt I belonged there.
zul: "Kimi, kwaba wumuzwa wokuthi, 'Ngangazi ukuthi ngingakwenza lokhu, futhi manje sengikwenzile'. Ngangikholwa wukuthi kungenzeka, ngakho kwaba mnandi ukuqinisekisa lokho. Ngabe nethuba lokunqoba bese ngayithatha, angikhwincekanga, angomanga ngesikhathi esibalulekile. Angizange ngihluleke wukubhekana nencindezi yokuba sethubeni lokunqoba emdlalweni wami wokuqala. Ngangizizwela ukuthi ngifanelwe wukuba lapha.
mt0: <pad> "For me, it was the feeling of, 'I knew I could do this, and now I have done it'. I believed it could be done, so it was nice to confirm that. I had the chance to win and I took it, I didn't give up, I didn't slip at the crucial moments. I didn't fail to handle the pressure of being in a good position to win my first game. I felt I deserved to be here.</s>
